function.name: heatingTemperature_decrease
function.description: This function is used to lower the heating temperature of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to lower the heating temperature.

heatingTemperatureDelta.description: The amount by which to decrease the heating temperature.
